doc:
Jeffrey Stone https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeffrey_Stone 0 Jeffrey Stone (December 16, 1926 – August 22, 2012) was an American actor and voice-over artist. Stone was the model and inspiration for Prince Charming in the 1950 Walt Disney animated feature film, Cinderella. While he did not voice the character in the film, Stone did provide some of the movie's additional voices. Jeffrey_Stone ( December_16_,_1926 – August_22_,_2012 ) was an_American_actor and voice-over_artist . Stone was the_model_and_inspiration for Prince_Charming in the_1950_Walt_Disney_animated_feature_film , Cinderella . While he did_not_voice the_character in the_film , Stone did_provide some of the_movie 's_additional_voices .
